languages.text: "И чего вы достойны? Только праведной кары. Но Император милостив и дает вам шанс искупления через кровь и тяжкий труд во славу Его".

traits.locale_text: "И чего вы достойны? Только праведной кары. Но Император милостив и дает вам шанс искупления через кровь и тяжкий труд во славу Его".

languages.text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
languages.original_text: "И чего вы достойны? Только праведной кары. Но Император милостив и дает вам шанс искупления через кровь и тяжкий труд во славу Его".

traits.locale_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
"So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
"So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
"So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
"So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

languages.text: «Así que no merecéis otra cosa que un justo castigo. Pero el Emperador es misericordioso y os concede una oportunidad para redimiros vertiendo sangre y sudor en Su nombre».
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

traits.locale_text: «Así que no merecéis otra cosa que un justo castigo. Pero el Emperador es misericordioso y os concede una oportunidad para redimiros vertiendo sangre y sudor en Su nombre».

languages.text: 「それで、あなたは何に値するのか？正当な罰だけです。しかし、皇帝は慈悲深く、御名において血と苦役を通して贖罪の機会を与えてくださる」
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

traits.locale_text: 「それで、あなたは何に値するのか？正当な罰だけです。しかし、皇帝は慈悲深く、御名において血と苦役を通して贖罪の機会を与えてくださる」

languages.text: “既然如此，你们应当得到什么？你们只配得到正义的惩罚。然而，帝皇对祂的子民充满仁慈。祂以祂的名义，赐予了你们这个赎罪的机会，让你们通过劳动与鲜血来洗清罪名。”
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，你们应当得到什么？你们只配得到正义的惩罚。然而，帝皇对祂的子民充满仁慈。祂以祂的名义，赐予了你们这个赎罪的机会，让你们通过劳动与鲜血来洗清罪名。”

languages.text: "Was verdient ihr also? Nichts als rechtschaffene Bestrafung. Doch der Imperator ist gnädig und gibt euch eine Chance auf Erlösung durch Blut und harte Arbeit in Seinem Namen."
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

traits.locale_text: "Was verdient ihr also? Nichts als rechtschaffene Bestrafung. Doch der Imperator ist gnädig und gibt euch eine Chance auf Erlösung durch Blut und harte Arbeit in Seinem Namen."

languages.text: « Alors, que méritez-vous ? Rien d'autre qu'un châtiment à la hauteur de vos offenses. Mais l'Empereur est miséricordieux et il vous laisse une chance de vous racheter en versant votre sang et votre sueur en Son nom. »
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."

traits.locale_text: « Alors, que méritez-vous ? Rien d'autre qu'un châtiment à la hauteur de vos offenses. Mais l'Empereur est miséricordieux et il vous laisse une chance de vous racheter en versant votre sang et votre sueur en Son nom. »

languages.text: "Layığınız ne midir? Hakkaniyetli şekilde cezalandırılmanızdır. Lakin İmparator bağışlayıcıdır, O'nun adına kanınızı feda edip sıkı çaba gösterirseniz kurtuluşa erme şansı tanır."
languages.original_text: "So what do you deserve? Only righteous punishment. But the Emperor is merciful and gives you a chance of redemption through blood and hard toil in His name."
